column4: I'm seeing an annoying wireless ethernet problem, that I was hoping someone could help me with
I'm trying to run WEP, if I set the essid & wep key manually via iwconfig, everything works fine. but if I set those via the /etc/network/interfaces file, ifup doesn't seem to pick up the changes
I'm sure I'm doing something stupid wrong, just can't quite figure it out
I suspect that this is a config problem, rather than a device/driver problem
im not sure, not a linux guru. i could be consired a newbie =)
